ReleaseNotes.ReleaseNote: Added more dynamic car parking. Added more scenery elements, like bathrooms and cones blocking taxiways. Added Airpower dependency. Added light posts around the airport. Fixed some of the south aprons taxiway signs. Changed thumbnail.
Added collection v2 library to fill out the vintage area. Moved around the Choppertown assets some.
Added primary runways and primary north and south taxis.
Added more crowd placements. Added more GA parking. Fixing taxiway signs on north apron.
Added dynamic car parking. Added numerous SimObjects (A320, 747, Pelican, etc). Added various scenery objects to Paradise City and airplane parking. Added more fencing to south apron.
Remarked the taxiways to match airport chart instead of LittleNav Map. Added taxiway designators. Added extra aprons. Adjusted GA Parking and Camping based on taxiway cleanup.
Added more shelters and structures to the south apron.
Added more scenery elements to north apron. Added a ton of GA parking. Added terminal parking to north apron. Removed certain assets to help with frame rates.
Started adding assets to north aprons to fill out space (Sheltair, etc). Added Thumbnail.
Added GA camp. Added more military scenery. Added more scenery elements to Paradise City.
